Data: Hazlewood to Amla, no run full and nibbling away a touch outside off, Amla watches it through to Wade
Hazlewood to Amla, no run pitched further up and angled in, Amla blocks it to short extra cover. Solid
Hazlewood to Amla, no run full and outside off, left alone. The carry is far from encouraging

Hazlewood to Amla, no run shoots low, big appeal for lbw, umpire Wilson does not budge. Smith does not opt for a review. Full and moves in to catch the pad in front of the leg stump. It was probably grazing leg or going down with the angle. Umpire's call would have prevailed, I suppose
Hazlewood to Amla, no run fuller and outside off, neatly pushed to mid-off
Hazlewood to Amla, no run full and around off, does not come on to Amla. Wafty drive to mid-off. Hazlewood opens with a maiden
Coulter-Nile to de Kock, no run length and outside off, pushed to mid-off
Coulter-Nile to de Kock, no run full and angling outside off, Qdk pokes and manages an inside edge onto the pad
Coulter-Nile to de Kock, FOUR runs a tad overpitched and outside off, Qdk steps forward and smoothly drives it past the bowler, beats mid-off to his left. Nice and crisp....
Coulter-Nile to de Kock, no run back of a length, NCN drags his length back and gets it to slant away past the outside edge of the groping bat
Coulter-Nile to de Kock, no run back of a length on off, dropped defensively to the right of short cover
Coulter-Nile to de Kock, 2 runs back of a length and around off, tapped through midwicket
Hazlewood to Amla, 1 run fuller and outside off, run down to third man
Hazlewood to de Kock, no run fullish and angling away from Qdk, he shuffles across and works it defensively to the leg side
Hazlewood to de Kock, no run fuller and outside off, clipped out to midwicket. Shuffles across and nurdles it
Hazlewood to de Kock, no run pitched up and outside off, driven straight to mid-off
Hazlewood to de Kock, no run full and angled in on off and middle, the left-hander covers up in defence
Hazlewood to de Kock, no run dug in outside off, shovelled to the man at mid-on
Coulter-Nile to Amla, 1 wide half-volley slipping down leg, Amla can't glance it away. Beaten
Coulter-Nile to Amla, FOUR runs shot! Short and width outside off, Amla waits, gets on top of the bounce, slapping it with the wrists to the left of diving backward point
Coulter-Nile to Amla, no run back of a length and angled in on off, Amla stands tall and punchily defends to short extra cover
Coulter-Nile to Amla, 1 run shorter and outside off, does not come onto the bat, Amla hangs back and rides it down to third man
Coulter-Nile to de Kock, 1 run pitched up on the off stump, the left-hander shows the full face of the bat and push-drives it straight down the ground. Minimal followthrough
Coulter-Nile to Amla, no run full and aimed at off, Amla looks to drive and toe-ends it to mid-off
Coulter-Nile to Amla, no run overpitched on middle, serene drive to mid-on
Hazlewood to de Kock, no run short and angled around off from round the stumps, open-faced glide to point
Hazlewood to de Kock, no run full and angled in on the off stump, Qdk inches forward and blocks it to short extra cover
Hazlewood to de Kock, no run back of a length and comes in on off, Qdk does not cover the movement, ends up poking it back to the bowler via an inside edge
Hazlewood to de Kock, 1 run full and outside off, Qdk leans back and chops a single down to third man
Hazlewood to Amla, no run back of a length and around off, Amla plays it up to short extra cover
Hazlewood to Amla, 1 leg bye raps the pad outside the line of off. Amla walks across off aiming for a whip over midwicket and misses
Coulter-Nile to Amla, 1 wide full and angling down leg, wide
Coulter-Nile to Amla, 1 run short and outside off, helped down to third man
Coulter-Nile to de Kock, no run back of a length and on off, nudged straight to square leg
Coulter-Nile to de Kock, no run full and outside off, pushed to the covers
Coulter-Nile to de Kock, SIX runs too full and straight, Qdk picks it up and dispatches it over midwicket. Puts the bad ball way. He sent his pick-up shots flying at the IPL for Daredevils

Coulter-Nile to de Kock, no run NCN angles in a short ball and tucks the batsman up for room. Qdk stabs and chops it onto the ground off a thick inside edge that bounces over the stumps. Nearly dragged on
Coulter-Nile to de Kock, FOUR runs width outside off, Qdk slashes and gets an edge that would have lodged into the hands of first slip. He isn't there. Instead, rolls to third man for four
Hazlewood to Amla, 1 run full and angled in, Amla sits back and nurdles a single to square leg
Hazlewood to de Kock, no run picked away off the pads... straight to short fine leg

Hazlewood to de Kock, OUT full and angled in to catch the pad from round the stumps. Qdk flicks and misses/may have tickled it. The umpire - Wilson - gives it as runs. Smith has a chat with Wade and goes for a review. The on-field call is not out. I can't spot an inside snick. There isn't
Hazlewood to Rossouw, no run full and angled in from round the wicket, inside-edged to mid-on
Hazlewood to Rossouw, FOUR runs short and wide outside off, Rossouw frees his arms and cuts it firmly to the left of diving backward point. He gets off the mark with a crunched four
Hazlewood to Rossouw, no run back of a length and angled in, blocked to short midwicket
Lyon to Amla, no run dangled across off, Amla shuffles across off and nudges to short midwicket
Lyon to Amla, no run shorter and outside off, chopped straight to point
Lyon to Amla, no run whipped from outside off to short midwicket
Lyon to Amla, no run slides on off, driven to mid-off
Lyon to Amla, 1 run flicked off the off stump after shuffling across to short fine leg who fumbles
Lyon to Rossouw, no run drifts on the off stump, dabbed wide of lone slip. Not much turn, but tight lines from Lyon
Hazlewood to Amla, 1 run back of a length and outside off, Amla has all the time in the world to help it down to third man
Hazlewood to Rossouw, 1 run chopped wide of point
Hazlewood to Amla, 1 wide full and floated wide outside off, Amla slashes and does not touch it. Wide
Hazlewood to Amla, 1 run straying into the hips, whipped past backward square leg
Hazlewood to Rossouw, no run a touch overpitched on off, free-flowing drive to mid-off
Hazlewood to Rossouw, 1 run back of a length on off, leans back and chops it down to third man
Hazlewood to Amla, no run back of a length on off, Amla bends and defends
Lyon to Rossouw, no run turn! Pitches on off and breaks away, gingerly defended
Lyon to Rossouw, 1 run full and keeps low on off, dabs it to Maxi at second slip who lets it through him
Lyon to Amla, 1 run floated on off, driven firmly. Mitch Marsh throws himself to his right to stop the ball at mid-off
Lyon to Rossouw, no run slides on middle, straight ball, nudged to leg

Lyon to Rossouw, OUT Rossouw presses forward and has been given out lbw by ump Illingworth. Looks adjacent. No inside snick there. Rossouw reviews. Not a good one. South Africa have lost their review. Another one that straightens, fuller in length, hit in front of middle. He pushed forward
Lyon to de Villiers, 2 runs offbreak, heads down leg, AB stays back and nudges it fine on the leg side
Zampa to Amla, no run skids on middle, punched back, Zampa dives to his left and deflects to short extra cover
Zampa to Amla, no run slower through the air on middle, 76ks, dabbed back to Zampa
Zampa to Amla, 2 runs Amla bends and meets a full toss, scooped down to long leg. Toe-ended it
Zampa to Amla, 1 run fuller on off, Amla pre-meditated by going low for a paddle-scoop. Deflects it wide of the keeper, behind square
Zampa to de Villiers, 2 runs long hop outside off, AB skips back and cracks it to sweeper cover
Zampa to de Villiers, no run skids on off, AB gets forward and taps it to short extra cover
Lyon to Amla, 1 run slapped from outside off, to long-on on the back foot
Lyon to de Villiers, no run AB skips out and is deceived in flight. He adjusts and squirts it to the leg side
Lyon to de Villiers, 1 run flat dart outside off, bottom-handed shovel to long-on
Lyon to Amla, 1 run shorter and angled across off, chopped to sweeper cover
Lyon to de Villiers, no run slides on off, AB presses forward and blocks it back to the bowler
Lyon to de Villiers, no run full and breaks in a touch to catch the pad outside off
Zampa to Amla, 1 run flat legbreak, Amla steps back and whips past midwicket
Zampa to de Villiers, 2 runs tossed on off, AB drives it to the right of sweeper. AB wants two and gets it
Zampa to de Villiers, no run full and straight, AB presses forward and bunts it to midwicket. No turn there
Zampa to de Villiers, 1 run no turn again, skiddy short ball on off. AB stands tall and punches it past the covers
Zampa to Amla, 1 wide slipping down leg, errant ball, wide
Zampa to Amla, 1 run dangled outside off, sliced square on the off side. This turned a bit and messed with Amla's drive
Zampa to de Villiers, 1 run fired down leg, shovelled to fine leg
Lyon to de Villiers, 1 run short and angled across, keeps low outside off. Swatted on the back foot to the midwicket region
Lyon to Amla, FOUR runs slides on outside off, Amla leans into the drive and drives it sweetly past diving short extra cover. Twirled his wrists to place it to the left of the man there
Lyon to Amla, 1 run full and straight, turned to square leg for one
Lyon to de Villiers, 1 run flat and breaks in on the leg stump, flicked behind square leg
Lyon to Amla, 1 run flat and pushed outside off, forced to sweeper cover on the back foot
Lyon to de Villiers, no run AB shuffles across and forward to smother this full ball
Zampa to Amla, 1 run lets rip a slider on off and middle, chopped through the covers. That kept alarmingly low
Zampa to de Villiers, no run lovely legbreak, leaves AB and defeats him
Zampa to de Villiers, no run straighter one, blocked on the front foot to short extra cover
Zampa to de Villiers, 1 run floated outside off, AB attempts a sweep and hits it in the air.... Bounces in front of deep midwicket
Zampa to Amla, 2 runs turn and bounce! Legbreak nips away, Amla stays back gets on top of the bounce and guides it behind point
Zampa to Amla, 1 run full on middle, knocked through mid-on
Marsh to Amla, 1 run too full and outside off, Amla carves it to sweeper cover
Marsh to de Villiers, no run AB shows his ace early and dances out. Marsh pulls his length back and keeps the advancing batsman to a defence
Marsh to de Villiers, 1 run attempted short ball, keeps low outside off... He reaches out and steers to third man
Marsh to Amla, no run full and attacking off, Amla shuffles across the stumps and nurdles it to square leg. Finch collects the ball quickly and does not effect a direct hit at the non-striker's end
Marsh to Amla, 1 run back of a length, keeps low on off again. No bounce at all. Perhaps there is more life in Mars. Run down to third man
Marsh to de Villiers, no run looks like an offcutter, AB pushes to mid-on
Finch to Amla, 1 run just skids on outside off, chopped on the back foot to sweeper cover
Finch to de Villiers, no run AB skips back and punches this one to point
Finch to de Villiers, no run slides on off, shovelled back to the bowler
Finch to de Villiers, no run tapped to short extra cover
Finch to de Villiers, 1 run full on off, square-driven for one
Finch to Amla, 1 run fired outside off, Amla sits back and clunks a cut to sweeper cover
Marsh to Amla, 1 run too straight to Amla who will flick away all day/night to square leg for one
Marsh to de Villiers, 1 run full, overly full, a bit of away shape and nicely driven to deep cover with a fluent drive
Marsh to Amla, 1 run cross-seam fullish outside off, Amla dabs to third man with an angled bat. Really good
Marsh to de Villiers, no run fuller than a good length and straight, blocked
Marsh to de Villiers, no run slightly too straight again, enabling an easy flick but AB finds midwicket. A run missed
Marsh to de Villiers, 1 run makes it up with an awesome single. Just a bunt to Maxwell at mid-on and AB called for one immediately. Made it with enviable ease

Finch to de Villiers, OUT gone! Fantastic fielding from Steven Smith. Manufactures a wicket, and a massive one too. Amla run-out again. A darter outside off is punched to the left of Smith, who runs around and stops it in one swift motion. He has the presence of mind to realise it is Amla
Finch to de Villiers, 1 run some flight on off, driven to long-off with the spin
Finch to Duminy, 1 run more flight outside off, JP hustles to the pitch to whip to long-on. Good intent
Finch to de Villiers, no run floated up on off, driven to cover
Finch to de Villiers, no run a bit leg side-ish, but AB is persistent on hitting with the spin so he steps outside leg to drive to cover
Finch to de Villiers, 1 run hardly any bounce. Flat outside off, slow, keeps slower of the pitch. AB pushes to long-off
Maxwell to de Villiers, 1 run a full toss on off, driven to long-on
Maxwell to Duminy, no run flatter trajectory outside off, driven to cover
Maxwell to Duminy, 1 run too much flight, too full. Drilled to long-off, with the spin, nicely played
Maxwell to de Villiers, 1 run flat on middle, AB goes pack to punch to long-on
Maxwell to Duminy, no run nicely bowled, flight on middle and off. Blocked into the off side
Maxwell to Duminy, 3 runs excellent execution. Flat on middle, JP gets low and paddle reverse-sweeps past short third man. An easy three
Finch to Duminy, no run more flight outside off, JP tries to open the face to find a gap at point but can't. Blocked
Finch to Duminy, no run shaped to sweep now but the length wasn't there so he improvised a block
Finch to Duminy, no run flighted on middle and flicked to square leg
Finch to Duminy, 3 runs just over short third man. An iffy stroke but e gets away with it. Tossed up on middle, Jp top-edges his reverse sweep, just over third man. Three more
Finch to de Villiers, 1 run nicely driven to long-off, with the turn
Finch to Duminy, 1 run fired in on middle, bunted to long-on
Maxwell to Duminy, 1 run nice batting. Opens the face, as late as possible, to guide to point
Maxwell to de Villiers, 1 run driven to long-on
Maxwell to Duminy, no run nice stop. Hit towards ,mid-on but Maxwell scurries across to stop the ball from passing
Maxwell to Duminy, no run steered to third man
Maxwell to Duminy, no run flat and full and blocked
Maxwell to Duminy, no run blocked off the front foot

Coulter-Nile to de Villiers, OUT bowled im. Massive wicket. AB is gone. Full on off, tails back in just enough to beat AB's bat. He tried to open the face to guide to third man but the ball jagged back just enough to go through his defences. Huge wicket this.
Coulter-Nile to Behardien, no run fullish on middle, pushed to mid-on
Coulter-Nile to Behardien, no run full again outside off, Behardien blocks
Coulter-Nile to Behardien, no run shortish delivery on middle, Behariden hurries on his toes to flick to square leg
Coulter-Nile to Behardien, no run quite full, looking to get one through again, Pushed to mid-on
Coulter-Nile to Behardien, no run full again to finish. A maiden as Behardien pushes to mid-off
Lyon to Duminy, 3 runs shortish outside off, shovelled towards midwicket for three. well played from Duminy. 100 up
Lyon to Behardien, no run some flight on off and Behardien lunges forward to defend
Lyon to Behardien, 1 run nicely bowled. Flight outside off, squeezed to long-on
Lyon to Duminy, no run shorter and slower towards outside off, patted towards point
Lyon to Duminy, no run more flight on off, Duminy lunges forward to defend
Lyon to Duminy, no run nice bowling again, closer towards middle and leg but Duminy offers another dead bat to defend
Coulter-Nile to Behardien, no run full and straight, going wider of the crease. Pushed to short mid-on. Good lines, attacking those stumps
Coulter-Nile to Behardien, 2 runs shorter delivery on middle, Behardien nudges towards backward square leg for a couple. Placed that well
Coulter-Nile to Behardien, 1 run clipped to square leg. Strays in line
Coulter-Nile to Duminy, no run a loose stroke. Fullish and wide, some away shape. Duminy wafts but is beaten
Coulter-Nile to Duminy, no run inside-edged to the keeper. Full and wide, Duminy drives but doesn't quite connect. Good bowling

Coulter-Nile to Duminy, OUT bowled im. SA in tatters. NCN again. An absolute beauty. Not much he could have done actually. A good length delivery on off, straightens just enough to beat Duminy's bat. Uproots off stump. NCN defeated AB with one that jagged back in, beats Duminy with the aw
Lyon to Behardien, no run flight outside off, pushed to cover
Lyon to Behardien, 1 run slightly shorter on middle, Behardien rocks back to clip to square leg
Lyon to Parnell, 1 run shorter and wide, a free delivery for Parnell to slap to deep cover.
Lyon to Behardien, 1 run nice batting. Goes deep and then clips to square leg, intentionally in front of midwicket
Lyon to Parnell, no run ripping turn. Slower and wider outside off, the ball grips and beats the bat
Lyon to Parnell, no run flight on off, Parnell presses forward to defend
Coulter-Nile to Behardien, no run good length on middle and leg, turned to midwicket
Coulter-Nile to Behardien, no run almost got one under the bat. Overpitched on middle, Behardien jams it out
Coulter-Nile to Behardien, no run the shot AB was trying to play. Fullish outside off, tapped to point
Coulter-Nile to Behardien, no run full and straight, attacking the stumps but Behardien's defensive technique interferes
Coulter-Nile to Behardien, no run dabbed to point again
Coulter-Nile to Behardien, no run yorker, well-executed but the line is well outside off. Behardien fails to get bat on this
Lyon to Parnell, no run drift and flight on leg, Parnell digs this out
Lyon to Parnell, no run flight on middle, Parnell pushes to cover. A lull in play
Lyon to Parnell, no run slightly shorter outside off, Parnell rushes on the back foot to cut to point
Lyon to Parnell, 1 run driven with the turn to long-off
Lyon to Behardien, no run flight on middle, Behardien rushes to the pitch and then drives back to the bowler
Lyon to Behardien, FOUR runs edged away. Short and wide from Lyon, Behardien goes back late and gets a thick outside edge which races away to the third man boundary
Hazlewood to Parnell, no run full from around the wicket, and straight. Flicked to midwicket

Hazlewood to Parnell, OUT got im. One more. Another batsman's off stump goes for a jolly walk. Kept very low. Full on off, Parnell presses forward to that and planted his bat down the line but the ball pitched and kept low enough to creep under the bat. Clattered into off stump. SA six do
Hazlewood to Phangiso, no run
Hazlewood to Phangiso, no run full and wide, left alone but some discernible inward movement after the ball left the bat
Hazlewood to Phangiso, no run full and straight, honing in on that off stump. Defended
Hazlewood to Phangiso, no run blocked out from the front foot
Lyon to Behardien, FOUR runs shot! Too full from Lyon outside off, Behardien lays into the drive and finds the gap through cover. Played that against the turn
Lyon to Behardien, 1 run flat on off, FB goes back to work to square leg. A good single
Lyon to Phangiso, no run tossed up on off, blocked with a straight bat, hit the toe-end
Lyon to Phangiso, no run nudged to short fine leg
Lyon to Phangiso, no run fullish and straight, nurdled to short fine leg again
Lyon to Phangiso, no run and again. Phangiso finds fine leg
Hazlewood to Phangiso, no run ooh, beaten. Full and wide, Phangiso plays a bit late and the fullish delivery goes past
Hazlewood to Phangiso, 1 run shortish on middle, Phangso fends off to fine leg
Hazlewood to Behardien, 1 run lazy, sloppy. Unlike Aus. One extra. Full on middle, driven to mid-on. Zampa's throw bounces just in front of Wade who cannot collect
Hazlewood to Phangiso, no run full and straight, defended
Hazlewood to Phangiso, no run good length on middle, defended to midwicket
Hazlewood to Phangiso, no run shortish and wide, chopped towards point for one
Zampa to Behardien, FOUR runs a long-hop outside off, Behardien rocks back and swats over midwicket, on the bounce. Picked the length early and hit it over midwicket, didn't bother keeping it down
Zampa to Behardien, no run flat on off, smother-pulled to midwicket
Zampa to Behardien, no run nice comeback. The flatter delivery on off, defended by FB
Zampa to Behardien, no run lots of flight down leg, worked to midwicket
Zampa to Behardien, 2 runs shortish and wide, chopped to point. By the time deep cover gets to the ball, the pair get two
Zampa to Behardien, no run good end. Tossed up on off and defended
Coulter-Nile to Phangiso, no run full and angled in on off from over the stumps, Phangiso tips forward and blocks it with a straight bat
Coulter-Nile to Phangiso, no run this does not bounce at all! Full and shoots low on middle, the batsman goes low with it to jam it out
Coulter-Nile to Phangiso, no run NCN goes wide of the crease and angles it on the legs, clipped to square leg
Coulter-Nile to Phangiso, 1 run digs a short ball outside off, but it does not rise much, Phangiso gets on top of the bounce and fends to short third man
Coulter-Nile to Behardien, no run wicket-to-wicket line, another one stays low, jabbed to short midwicket
Coulter-Nile to Behardien, no run FB uses his feet, the bowler pulls his length back on off. Quietly played back to NCN
Zampa to Phangiso, no run backs away and pushes the short ball to the covers
Zampa to Phangiso, 1 run tossed full on off and breaks away, induces an outside edge that rolls to short third man
Zampa to Behardien, no run fired full on middle, dug out to cover
Zampa to Behardien, no run legbreak, shoots low outside off, beats the batsman, dips and beats Wade as well
Zampa to Behardien, 1 run down the track and driven to long-off for one

Zampa to Phangiso, no run slider, hits the pad, not given by ump Illingworth. Smith wants a review. It's a legal ball. Did it pitch in line? It pitched on leg but tracker shows that it was nipping down leg. Phangiso survives and sips some drinks
Coulter-Nile to Behardien, no run NCN tests FB with a bouncer, he ducks and avoids it
Coulter-Nile to Behardien, no run little offcutter on off, check-pushed back to the bowler
Coulter-Nile to Behardien, 1 run full and angled in on off, tapped in front of mid-off for an urgent single
Coulter-Nile to Phangiso, 1 run too straight in line, picked away past square leg
Coulter-Nile to Behardien, no run back of a length and angled in, FB slides back in the crease and defends it in front of his toes
Coulter-Nile to Behardien, no run keeps alarmingly low on off, FB squirts it behind the wicket. He examines the toe end of the bat
Zampa to Phangiso, no run flighted on off, Phangiso gets forward and smothers it
Zampa to Phangiso, no run shorter and outside off, rocks back and chops to Maxi at short extra cover
Zampa to Phangiso, no run legbreak, dabbed in front of point
Zampa to Phangiso, no run drifts full on to the leg stump, squeezed out to cover
Zampa to Phangiso, no run full and dips on middle, jammed back to Zampa
Zampa to Phangiso, 1 run shorter legbreak outside off, cut to sweeper cover on the back foot
Coulter-Nile to Phangiso, no run fuller and outside off, runs it to point off the face
Coulter-Nile to Phangiso, no run back of a length and angled in, defended to short midwicket
Coulter-Nile to Phangiso, no run length ball on a fourth-stump line, patted back to the bowler on the front foot
Coulter-Nile to Phangiso, no run overpitched and outside off, stops on Phangiso. Check-driven in front of short extra cover
Coulter-Nile to Phangiso, 1 run whipped from off stump to the left of diving square leg
Coulter-Nile to Behardien, 1 run rising short ball outside off, FB hops and rides it down to third man
Lyon to Behardien, 1 run slides on off from round the stumps, FB moves around in the crease and chops to short third man. Sets off for a risky one
Lyon to Phangiso, 1 run breaks in to the pads on a shorter length, punched to long-on
Lyon to Behardien, no run down the track and flicked to Smith at short midwicket
Lyon to Behardien, no run floater on off, forward and smothered onto the pitch
Lyon to Behardien, no run FB steps outside leg, Lyon follows him with an offbreak, squirted onto the pad off an inside edge
Lyon to Behardien, 1 run quicker full ball on the leg stump, glanced to fine leg
Coulter-Nile to Behardien, no run full and aimed at off, played to mid-of
Coulter-Nile to Behardien, no run full and angled in, pushed to mid-off again
Coulter-Nile to Behardien, no run offcutter on middle, this is bunted to the right of mid-off now
Coulter-Nile to Behardien, FOUR runs short and wide outside off, FB frees his arms and slashes a cut through point. There is nobody sweeping the off-side boundary
Coulter-Nile to Behardien, no run picked off the pads to short midwicket
Coulter-Nile to Behardien, 1 run veering into the pads again, the batsman helps it to fine leg
Zampa to Behardien, 1 run paddled behind square
Zampa to Phangiso, no run lobs this full ball on middle, heaved to mid-on

Zampa to Phangiso, OUT Phangiso goes for another wild heave. He makes a mess of it and holes out to long-off. Tosses a legbreak. The batsman goes low for a slog-sweep. He skews it into the hands of Hazlewood. FB shakes his head at the non-striker's end
Zampa to Behardien, 1 run follows it with another loopy legbreak, dabbed to the covers
Zampa to Rabada, no run Zampa whirls down a quicker ball, kept out
Zampa to Rabada, 1 run short legbreak leaves the left-hander, chopped to the covers
Hazlewood to Rabada, no run angled into the pads from around the wicket, nudged to mid-on
Hazlewood to Rabada, no run back of a length and angled on the leg stump, dabbed to mid-on again
Hazlewood to Rabada, no run back of a length and angled in on middle, Rabada gets behind the line and covers it
Hazlewood to Rabada, no run full and angled in on middle, defended to short midwicket
Hazlewood to Rabada, no run full and shoots low to ping the pad, but this was heading down leg
Hazlewood to Rabada, no run back of a length and angled in on middle, defended to mid-off. Another maiden for Hazlewood
Zampa to Behardien, 1 run full legbreak outside off, driven to sweeper cover
Zampa to Rabada, 1 run shorter legbreak, slapped to sweeper cover on the back foot
Zampa to Behardien, 1 run picked away to the leg-side sweeper
Zampa to Rabada, no run blockhole ball, blocked back
Zampa to Rabada, no run quick and full on middle, defended back again
Zampa to Rabada, no run keeps low and turns away from the left-hander, he skips back, prods and misses
Hazlewood to Behardien, no run length and angled in, chopped to the right of the keeper from the crease
Hazlewood to Behardien, no run full and angled into FB. He drills it back to the bowler. Hazlewood goes with both hands, but it slips out. Dropped
Hazlewood to Behardien, no run short on off, hangs back and turns to midwicket
Hazlewood to Behardien, 1 run jabbed to sweeper cover from outside off
Hazlewood to Rabada, no run overpitched on off, driven to mid-off
Hazlewood to Rabada, 2 runs length and outside off, Rabada swishes and toe-ends it over the covers. Hazlewood finishes with 2 for 20
Zampa to Behardien, no run slid through on off, poked to cover
Zampa to Behardien, 1 run full and outside off, driven to long-off
Zampa to Rabada, no run tossed on middle, stabbed to cover
Zampa to Rabada, 1 run slider on middle, knocked to leg
Zampa to Behardien, 1 run down the track and drills a drive to long-on
Zampa to Rabada, 1 run googly leaves Rabada outside off, he perhaps picked it off the pitch, dabbing towards short third man
Hazlewood to Behardien, no run overpitched on off, driven to mid-on
Hazlewood to Behardien, no run more inward movement. Not sharp but enough. On off and hit to cover from the front foot
Hazlewood to Behardien, 3 runs nicely driven. Didn't look to overhit that, just timed a drive through extra cover for three.
Hazlewood to Phangiso, no run full and straight, solidly and confidently blocked
Hazlewood to Phangiso, no run defended off the front foot again. No real intent to look for runs
Hazlewood to Phangiso, no run looking for the yorker but misses his length. A full toss is driven to mid-on
Lyon to Behardien, 1 run tossed up outside off, pushed in front of point for a run
Lyon to Phangiso, 1 run outside off and shovelled to long-on. Well played
Lyon to Behardien, no run flight on off, defended
Lyon to Behardien, 1 run whipped away to square leg
Lyon to Phangiso, no run tossed up on off, defended
Lyon to Phangiso, 1 run flatter on off, confidently punched to long-on. Well played
Marsh to Rabada, no run full and shoots low outside off from round the wicket. KG cuts and misses
Marsh to Rabada, 1 run Marsh goes wide of the crease and angles it in. Fuller length. KG stands tall and it sticks in the surface. Check-pushed to left of short extra cover
Marsh to Behardien, no run down the track, meets a full toss, and mis-times a drive to short extra cover
Marsh to Behardien, no run short and wide outside off, FB misses out. Slashed only to short extra cover
Marsh to Behardien, 1 run full on middle, eased to long-on
Marsh to Rabada, 1 run back of a length and stops on off, pushed to long-off
Zampa to Rabada, no run legbreak rips outside off, past the outside edge
Zampa to Rabada, 1 run another legbreak, KG keeps back and angles it to short third man
Zampa to Behardien, 1 wide spinning down leg, wide
Zampa to Behardien, 1 run loopy and full on middle, driven to long-on
Zampa to Rabada, 1 run googly outside off, KG aims to bash it over the covers. He has to settle with a sliced outside edge to short third man
Zampa to Behardien, no run short on off, punched to short extra cover

Zampa to Behardien, SIX runs half-tracker on off, FB winds up and pulls it with authority over midwicket for six. It kept low but FB found the sweet spot on the bat. That strike raises his half-century
Marsh to Rabada, 2 runs full and outside off, swung to long-off
Marsh to Rabada, 1 run tucked off the hips through square leg
Marsh to Behardien, 1 run slower short ball outside off, shovelled to long-on
Marsh to Rabada, 1 run full and outside off, flat-batted to long-off
Marsh to Behardien, 2 runs full ball on off, slogged in the air to the left of a flying Smith at short midwicket, to long-on
Marsh to Behardien, 1 run cutter outside off, dabbed to the off side for one
Maxwell to Behardien, 2 runs full and outside off from round the stumps, sliced to long-off for two
Maxwell to Behardien, 2 runs too full on middle, belted to the left of long-on
Maxwell to Behardien, 2 runs dangled outside off, carved over extra cover
Maxwell to Behardien, OUT bowled'em. End of a fighting innings from FB. Tossed full and straight, FB bends for a reverse paddle. He misses and is nutmegged. Timbaaaah!
Maxwell to Tahir, OUT Tahir out! He runs down the track right away and runs out to the change room. He swings and slices it down the throat of NCN at long-off
Maxwell to Rabada, 1 run short on the leg stump, hacked away to cow corner. Hat-trick averted

4.30pm Slow, low conditions again. The ball shot low as well. This time, the seamers impressed. Hazlewood and NCN cut through the SA line-up before Behardien offered some fight with a half-century. He worked the ball into the gaps and farmed the strike with the tail. Eventually, SA finished with

5.10pm Welcome back to the chase. SA are going to need early wickets or they could be the team without points in round 1 of the tri-series. Australia may look at this early period is an opportunity to accrue as many runs as they can. Could be interesting. Finch and Warner again, Australia's best
Rabada to Warner, 1 run starts with a leg side-ish delivery and Warner happily tucks behind square for one
Rabada to Finch, no run good length on off, jags back in and Finch defends from the crease
Rabada to Finch, no run nice bowling. Full and wide outside off, some away shape. Finch strides forward to defend
Rabada to Finch, no run full length again outside off, a half-prod to point. Good start for Rabada
Rabada to Finch, no run overpitched outside off, easily driven but straight to short cover
Rabada to Finch, no run good end. Back of a length on off and solidly defended by Finch
Parnell to Warner, no run a sixth-stump line outside off, Warner backs away ever so slightly to make room and cut to point. Exceptional feet movement
Parnell to Warner, no run some swing, not a lot but enough. Fullish and wide outside off, tapped to point
Parnell to Warner, no run fullish outside off, Warner shovels a flick to mid-on

Parnell to Warner, OUT got im. Big wicket. Parnell gets the big fish. He isn't bothering with the review. Huge breakthrough. Fullish on middle and leg, the ball jags back and hits Warner flush in front of leg. Umpire's call was the likely outcome, if Warner reviewed.
Parnell to Khawaja, no run full on off, flicked to mid-on
Parnell to Khawaja, no run shortish outside off, not the pitch to be pulling emphatically but Khawaja tries to no success
Rabada to Finch, no run a good length on off, Finch blocks from the front foot
Rabada to Finch, no run keeps a bit low. 139 kph, fullish on off, whipped confidently to midwicket
Rabada to Finch, no run overpitched outside off, toe-ended to mid-off
Rabada to Finch, no run driven into the off side
Rabada to Finch, no run a bit leg side-ish. Missed a routine flick, an optimistic appeal is struck down. Finch has to try to get runs of these
Rabada to Finch, no run a low full toss outside off, squirted to mid-on. Another maiden
Parnell to Khawaja, no run make it 18. Back of a length outside off, blocked towards mid-on
Parnell to Khawaja, 1 run too straight and tucked towards midwicket for a run

Parnell to Finch, 1 run poor run. Misjudged. Fullish outside off, driven to mid-off where AB is lurking. So quick on the ball and releases, misses the stumps at the bowler's end. Out with a direct hit
Parnell to Khawaja, 1 run Khawaja shuffles across dangerously to off, gets some bat on his nudge otherwise that could have been lbw
Parnell to Finch, 1 run Finch opens the face to guide to third man. That was nicely played
Parnell to Khawaja, no run another good over. Quite full on off and driven back to the bowler
Rabada to Finch, FOUR runs short and smashed. Back of a length outside off, Finch stands tall and swats it over midwicket. Disdain
Rabada to Finch, 1 run opens the face to guide to third man

Rabada to Khawaja, OUT bowled im. Another big wicket. Khawaja is beaten and SA have struck. Overpitched on off and middle, hustles Khawaja for pace who gets his angled bat down too late. The ball clips the pads and then clatters into the stumps
Rabada to Smith, no run nice and full first up, Smith shuffles across and nudges to square leg
Rabada to Smith, 1 run guided down to third man. Opened the face
Rabada to Finch, no run a bit of width and scythed away but JP stops the boundary with a good dive. Nice stuff from SA so far
Parnell to Smith, 2 runs oh yes. Awesome timing. Fullish outside off, Smith transfers his weight forward as he drives and times the pants off it. Whistles past cover for a couple. Just a block
Parnell to Smith, no run good adjustment. Shortish on off, chopped towards gully
Parnell to Smith, 1 run nice shot. Manufactures a run by walking towards the ball and flicks to mid-on
Parnell to Finch, no run overly full outside off, blocked

Parnell to Finch, 1 run punched into the short cover region and sets off for a run. Rilee fields well, turns around and badly misses a throw to the bowler's end. Turned blindly did Rossouw, had more time than he thought he had
Parnell to Smith, 1 run dabbed to backward point for one. Well played again. Really good
Tahir to Smith, 1 run a naughty full toss on middle, punched to mid-off where AB picks up and fires the stumps down at the bowler's end. Smith is easily in
Tahir to Finch, no run another full toss, was the googly. Drilled to the bowler
Tahir to Finch, no run swept from an off-stump line to short fine leg
Tahir to Finch, no run flat on middle, Finch was shaping to sweep but bailed out, block to midwicket
Tahir to Finch, 1 run slower, shorter and wider. Slapped to long-off
Tahir to Smith, 1 run a googly on off, a thick inside edge to square leg for a single
Parnell to Smith, 1 run shot. Flicks the ball to fine leg from off stump. Wow, what power in those wrists
Parnell to Finch, no run cramps Finch for room with a good length delivery on off, blocked
Parnell to Finch, no run not short enough to pull on this surface. Keeps low and the ball beats Finch's pull. Kept ominously low, just over off stump
Parnell to Finch, 1 leg bye drifts down leg, pings off the pad to fine leg for a single

Parnell to Smith, OUT another wicket. Huge one again. But Smith reviews. Fullish on off, Smith shuffled across and missed a flick. The ball strikes him right in front of middle and leg. Looks out. No bat either. Australia in big trouble now. All reds and Smith is gone.
Parnell to Maxwell, no run good length outside off, defended by Maxi
Tahir to Finch, FOUR runs shot! Overpitched googly outside off and Finch muscles the drive past cover. Once he found the gap, twas always going to be four
Tahir to Finch, no run a full toss on middle, drilled to mid-on and a cry of anguish from Finch
Tahir to Finch, 1 run good fielding from AB. Another full toss is smashed towards mid-on, AB scampers across to field
Tahir to Maxwell, 1 run shortish legbreak outside off, pummeled to long-off
Tahir to Finch, no run the googly. Not picked. Finch went bat to cut but the variation came in and almost got through. Just about got bat down on it
Tahir to Finch, no run shortish and wide, chopped to point
Parnell to Maxwell, 1 run fullish on off, a thick outside edge to third man for a run
Parnell to Finch, SIX runs what do I know? Slightly too full on off, Finch sees the opportunity and lays into it with a powerful lofted drive over mid-on. Screams over the boundary
Parnell to Finch, FOUR runs just past cover. Very streaky. Not a great shot. Full again, Finch opens the face and drives uppishly. Just wide of cover. May have got there too early
Parnell to Finch, no run adjusts the length. Shortens it on off, blocked
Parnell to Finch, no run overpitched outside off, the ball sneaks past the outside edge
Parnell to Finch, no run a high full toss outside off, Finch times it to Rossouw at short cover who stops it with a dive
Phangiso to Maxwell, no run tossed up on off, Maxwell clears his pad and defends
Phangiso to Maxwell, 1 run short and slow outside off, extracts a bit of turn. Hit to deep point
Phangiso to Finch, no run tossed up outside off, skews off the outside edge to short third man
Phangiso to Finch, SIX runs wow, what timing. flight on off, Finch opens up the bat face and lifts it with the spin over cover. Fantastic shot
Phangiso to Finch, no run flat on leg, a leading edge bounces back to the bowler
Phangiso to Finch, 1 run nurdled to square leg. Too straight there. Good batting from Finch
Shamsi to Finch, no run yorker first up, too much flight. Blocked

Shamsi to Finch, no run huge appeal, not given. AB reviews. Flat delivery outside off, Finch strides forward and is beaten on the inside edge by a ripping legbreak. Struck him in front of middle, may be too much turn. No bat. Likelihood of this sliding down leg. Umpire's call on wickets.
Shamsi to Finch, 1 run too full and driven to long-on
Shamsi to Maxwell, no run tossed up on off, driven to mid-off.

Shamsi to Maxwell, OUT given this time. This one did not look out. But Umpire Joel Wilson gives him. Flat legbreak is sliding down leg, but Shamsi and co. don't care. He has a wicket in his first over on his debut. Maxwell's struggles continue
Shamsi to Marsh, FOUR runs poor delivery. Looking for too much, starts it too straight and Marsh flicks to the fine leg boundary
Phangiso to Finch, no run flat on off, defended
Phangiso to Finch, no run another flat delivery on middle, Finch goes back to defend
Phangiso to Finch, no run slider on off, almost goes through, Finch gets his bat down in time
Phangiso to Finch, 1 run short and wide, slapped to deep cover
Phangiso to Marsh, no run flight on off, blocked off the front foot
Phangiso to Marsh, 1 run slowish and wide, pushed towards deep cover for one
Shamsi to Marsh, 1 run flat on middle, comes back in and pushed to cover

Shamsi to Finch, no run another massive appeal, not out this time. Much flatter, the legbreak rips back in again but it looked like Finch got outside the line on that. Shamsi causing plenty of troubles
Shamsi to Finch, 1 run low full toss, swept powerfully to deep square leg
Shamsi to Marsh, no run the googly down leg, strikes Marsh on the back pad but pitched outside leg/. Another big appeal
Shamsi to Marsh, no run much fuller outside off, squirted back
Shamsi to Marsh, no run phew, this one slides past the outside edge. Marsh has no clue. Australia have no clue.
Phangiso to Finch, 1 run slow and straight, pushed to long-off
Phangiso to Marsh, 1 run short and wide, scythed to deep point
Phangiso to Finch, no run ooh, rips past the outside edge after Finch's half-willed prod
Phangiso to Finch, SIX runs shot. Vital runs these. Tossed up on off, Finch chooses to loft the ball and brings out exemplary timing and his power to lift over long-off
Phangiso to Finch, 1 run punched to long-on
Phangiso to Marsh, no run flat on off, pushed to point
Shamsi to Finch, no run Finch gets down to sweep but misses, struck outside the line of off

Shamsi to Finch, 2 runs ooh, should have been out. Amla misjudges the catch. Flat on middle, extra bounce takes Finch's top edge, lobs just over Amla who backtracked uncertainly. Did not pick it up at all
Shamsi to Finch, 1 run Finch persistent on the sweep, gloves to fine leg
Shamsi to Marsh, 1 run overpitched on off, driven to mid-off
Shamsi to Finch, no run another big appeal. Finch gets low to sweep again, a bit of glove on that
Shamsi to Finch, FOUR runs another sweep. Nails it this time, right outta the middle. Swept behind square and Finch picks up four
Tahir to Marsh, no run flight on off, pushed to point
Tahir to Marsh, no run another Tahir full toss is driven to the bowler
Tahir to Wade, 1 run tosses it full and outside off, Wade bends and sweeps it behind square
Tahir to Finch, 1 run pushed through outside off, Finch had pre-meditated. He went low and swept behind square. Finch reaches fifty Australia 74 for 5
Tahir to Wade, no run legbreak, Wade prods forward and defends it
Shamsi to Finch, 1 run lobs it full on middle and finds turn, Finch bends and top-edges a sweep wide of short fine leg

Shamsi to Wade, no run full and slower on middle, Wade aims to sweep... Scooped it. Nifty footwork from Qdk. He pre-meditated, pushed his right leg out, not in a right angle like Dhoni's karate kick. He ends up deflecting it to slip
Shamsi to Wade, no run spins in full, Wade takes it on the pad
Shamsi to Wade, no run massive appeal for lbw, umpire Wilson is unmoved. wrong'un from Shamsi, raps the pad. The tracker shows that it would have hit middle, Impact marginally on off. Umpire's call
Shamsi to Wade, no run tossed and turns away past the outside edge. Sharp turn
Shamsi to Wade, no run fullish and sticks in the surface. Wade check-drives and it does not carry to the diving short extra cover fielder
Tahir to Finch, FOUR runs played, Finch. Goes low, takes this googly from outside off, and sweeps nicely behind square
Tahir to Finch, no run tossed on off, dabbed to point
Tahir to Finch, 1 run fetches another one from outside off and sweeps to deep square leg
Tahir to Wade, no run ripping googly, leaves the left-hander, beats the outside edge. Good bounce as well
Tahir to Wade, 1 run pushed through on middle, Wade rolls his wrists on the sweep and sends it to long leg
Tahir to Finch, 1 run skiddy full ball on middle, 98ks, turned to the midwicket region
Rabada to Finch, no run back of a length and angled in on off, Finch covers up in defence
Rabada to Finch, 1 run back of a length and swerved in, nudged to short midwicket
Rabada to Wade, no run full and angled outside off, guided to point

Rabada to Wade, OUT Umpire Wilson's finger goes up. Rabada has Wade nicking behind! Australia six down and sinking. Angled in on a good length and leaves the left-hander outside off. 144.7ks, that Wade pushes with firm hands and edges it behind to de Kock
Rabada to Coulter-Nile, no run incutter from outside off, slices NCN into half. Zips past the inside edge
Rabada to Coulter-Nile, no run full and curves in, kept out. Top over from Rabada
Tahir to Finch, no run zips through outside off, nudges 100ks, hits the pad outside off as Finch bends, sweeps, and does not touch it
Tahir to Finch, no run flipper outside off, rushing ball. Flashes and is beaten again
Tahir to Finch, no run legbreak outside off, beaten again. Strike three!
Tahir to Finch, no run googly, sweeps and does not connect. Tahir hits the pad outside off
Tahir to Finch, 1 run straighter one, punched down to long-on
Tahir to Coulter-Nile, no run wrong'un, curls in and hits the front pad. Not given. It was doing too much to hit the stumps. Snaking down leg
Rabada to Finch, no run shortish on off, chopped to backward point
Rabada to Finch, 1 run back of a length and outside off, helped down to third man
Rabada to Coulter-Nile, no run short ball on off, NCN presses forward in defence
Rabada to Coulter-Nile, no run inswinging yorker on middle, squeezed out
Rabada to Coulter-Nile, no run back of a length outside off, punched straight to short extra cover
Tahir to Finch, no run googly, drifts off the pad to short fine leg
Tahir to Finch, no run quick fizzer outside off, jabbed through point
Tahir to Finch, FOUR runs floated on middle, another impressive sweep from Finch. Placed fine of short fine leg
Tahir to Finch, 1 run dragged from outside off to deep midwicket
Tahir to Lyon, no run sweeps and misses, strikes the pad outside off
Rabada to Finch, no run short and down leg, Finch shapes to pull. There was a noise there. Qdk can't catch the ball
Rabada to Finch, no run full and outside off, eased to short extra cover
Rabada to Finch, no run back of a length and angled in on off, Finch hops and blocks
Rabada to Finch, 1 run too straight in line, nurdled to square leg
Rabada to Lyon, no run overpitched and outside off, pushed to the covers
Rabada to Lyon, no run full and keeps low on off, played to backward point with an open face
Tahir to Finch, no run legbreak outside off, sweeps across the line and misses

Tahir to Finch, 3 runs slider on off, short in length, Finch steps back and away as he chops it in the gap at backward point. Rossouw chases the ball from backward point, dives and lands shoulder first onto the ground near the edge of the boundary. The top of the shoulder rammed into the
Tahir to Lyon, 1 run swept away to square leg
Tahir to Finch, no run breaks into the leg stump, inside-edged sweep onto the pad
Tahir to Finch, no run shorter and turns outside off, reaches out and chops to the covers
Tahir to Finch, no run ripping legbreak outside off, beats the outside edge
Shamsi to Lyon, FOUR runs floated on middle and leg, swept in the air... wide of short fine leg
Shamsi to Lyon, 1 run turns away outside off, swept to deep backward square leg
Shamsi to Finch, 1 run low full toss on off, swept to fine leg
Shamsi to Lyon, no run misses the sweep now, hits the front pad outside off
Shamsi to Lyon, 1 run puts bat on the sweep and sends it behind square for one
Shamsi to Finch, no run deflected off the pad to short fine leg
Parnell to Lyon, no run short and angled in, fended to short midwicket
Parnell to Lyon, no run short on off again, this is blocked past the bowler
Parnell to Lyon, no run incutter, slices the batsman into half and beats the inside edge, Kept low as well
Parnell to Lyon, 1 run short and angled into the leg stump, glanced to fine leg
Parnell to Finch, 1 run angled in, Finch camps back and gets an inside edge past the leg stump
Parnell to Lyon, no run back of a length and angled in on off, cramps Lyon for room. Chopped in front of point

Shamsi to Finch, no run and again, turns in, swept to the same fielder
Phangiso to Lyon, 1 run loud appeal for lbw, looks close. Arm-ball, snakes in with the arm, Lyon sweeps and looks like he has gloved it
Phangiso to Finch, no run Finch makes room outside leg, the bowler follows him with a turning ball, poked to point off an outside edge
Phangiso to Finch, no run 94ks quicker ball, kept out
Phangiso to Finch, no run flat on off, chopped towards the covers
Phangiso to Finch, no run spins away from Lyon, dabbed to point
Phangiso to Finch, no run overpitched and outside off, forward and driven to short extra cover

Shamsi to Lyon, 2 runs Shamsi held this back outside off, got turn away as well. Dabbed wide of short third man. Lyon was struggling on the second run. The full-length dive saved him. And Lyon becomes the second Australian batsman after Finch to reach double figures
Shamsi to Lyon, FOUR runs Lyon connects with the sweep now and sends it past short fine leg for four
Shamsi to Lyon, no run length and outside off, swept to square leg
Shamsi to Lyon, 1 run Lyon and Finch keep sweeping. This is played over square leg
Shamsi to Finch, 1 run full and turns across Finch who dabs a single to short third man
Phangiso to Finch, no run slider outside off, punched back to the bowler
Phangiso to Finch, no run another quick fizzer, blocked on the back foot

Phangiso to Finch, OUT Finch clears his front leg and holes out! AB pumps his fist and is mobbed by his team-mates. Finch stepped away outside leg in a bid to open up the off side. He is cramped for room by another quicker ball. 90.3ks. He ends up slicing a drive. AB dives full-stretch to
Phangiso to Hazlewood, 1 run tucked off the pads through square leg
Phangiso to Lyon, no run tossed and drifts in, Lyon misses the sweep
Phangiso to Lyon, 1 run Lyon swigs his hands through a sweep and sends the ball square on the leg side

Shamsi to Hazlewood, no run full and breaks in, defended
Shamsi to Hazlewood, no run googly, keeps low, kept out
Shamsi to Hazlewood, no run legbreak, dragged down, shovelled to short midwicket
Shamsi to Hazlewood, no run drifts in and turns away past the prodding bat
Shamsi to Hazlewood, FOUR runs Shami floats it up outside off, Hazlewood flashes a drive over extra cover

Tahir to Lyon, FOUR runs nicely played. A flat delivery outside off, Lyon dabs it late to the third man boundary. Pulled back just inside, Parnell has a bit of hand while making contact with the rope says the third umpire
Tahir to Lyon, 1 run shovelled to long-on
Tahir to Hazlewood, no run googly on off, squirted to point
Tahir to Hazlewood, no run a darter on off, Hazlewood goes back to defend into the off side
Tahir to Hazlewood, 2 runs superb shot again. Tossed up on off, Hazlewood drills a lofted drive to wide long-off where JP saves the boundary with a dive
Tahir to Hazlewood, FOUR runs the googly outside off, pushed into the gap at cover for a boundary. Nicely played by Hazlewood, looking as good as any batsman today
Rabada to Lyon, 4 leg byes four more. Albeit of the legs. Strays down leg and it clips the pad on the way to the fine leg boundary
Rabada to Lyon, no run back of a length outside off, pushed to point from the crease
Rabada to Lyon, no run fullish on off, mis-timed to midwicket
Rabada to Lyon, 2 runs punched behind point for a couple. Easily played.
Rabada to Lyon, 1 run back of a length delivery on leg, turned to square leg

Phangiso to Lyon, FOUR runs slogged away for four. Tossed up outside off, Lyon gets low and swats it into the gap at midwicket. Found a gap nicely

8.10pm South Africa, playing with three specialist spinners for the first time since 2011 in ODIs, secured their first points in the tri-series with a resounding win. After slumping to 112 for 6, Behardien stroked a mature half-century to boost his side to 189. Parnell then set up the defence by
South Africa won by 47 runs
Player of the match is Farhaan Behardien, SA
